faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our physiotherapy services.

q1.question: Do I need special software or hardware to use WexelCode?
q1.answer: No, WexelCode is conveniently accessible via the internet. All that is required is a stable Wi-Fi connection.

q2.question: What technical and organizational measures are in place for the WexelCode premises?
q2.answer: It would be ideal if the meeting could take place in a quiet room with a stable internet connection and enough space for movement during the therapy session. Additionally, you will need a computer with video and microphone functionality.

q3.question: What costs are associated with using WexelCode?
q3.answer: There are no costs for existing patients. As a new customer, you only need to pay â‚¬20 per therapy session.

q4.question: How can I book an appointment with WexelCode?
q4.answer: Register on our website, and then you can book an appointment online.

q5.question: Is my data safe when using WexelCode?
q5.answer: Data protection is our top priority. WexelCode complies with all data protection regulations and uses end-to-end encryption for the video consultations.

q6.question: How are therapy plans personalized with WexelCode?
q6.answer: The therapy plan is created at the beginning of treatment in close collaboration between the patient and the physiotherapist. The goal is to develop a personalized training plan for home use by the end of the therapy session.

q7.question: Is it possible to use WexelCode without prior knowledge of physiotherapy?
q7.answer: Yes, no prior knowledge is required. Any questions can be thoroughly addressed during the first therapy session.

q8.question: Do the physiotherapists using WexelCode have the necessary qualifications?
q8.answer: All our staff are qualified physiotherapists with extensive experience in video therapy and receive regular training.

q9.question: Does WexelCode offer customer service in case of questions or issues?
q9.answer: Yes, we offer customer service. If you have any questions or issues, simply email us at: service@wexelcode.com, and we will be happy to assist you.

ctaSection.title: Start Your Recovery Journey Today
ctaSection.description: Take the first step towards better health and mobility. Our expert physiotherapists are ready to help you achieve your wellness goals.

contact.sendYourConcerns: Please send us your concerns preferably by email to:
contact.message: For the fastest response, we recommend contacting us via email. Our team typically responds within 24 business hours. For urgent matters, please call us directly during business hours.
